The following are the original text and the summary.

[Original]
{ORIGINAL_TEXT}

[Summary]
{SUMMARY_TEXT}

According to the above instructions, determine whether each line of the original text (lines are separated by "\n") is included in the summary.
Assign "Y" or "N" to each line.

The output must be in valid JSON format.
Example return format:
[
{"text": "original sentence 1", "label": "Y"},
{"text": "original sentence 2", "label": "N"}
]

Do not output any additional explanations, comments, natural language sentences, or meta text.
Output only the JSON array.
